from docx import Document

doc = Document(''docs/manuscript_FINAL_20251011_135649.docx'')
full_text = ''\n''.join([p.text for p in doc.paragraphs])

# Find research contributions
contrib_start = full_text.lower().find(''our contributions'')
if contrib_start == -1:
    contrib_start = full_text.lower().find(''contribution'')

if contrib_start != -1:
    print(''=''*70)
    print(''RESEARCH CONTRIBUTIONS'')
    print(''=''*70)
    contrib_section = full_text[contrib_start:contrib_start+2000]
